direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve operations on collections, specifically adding and removing elements.
Both methods modify the collection by removing elements, but retainAll retains only the elements in the specified collection.
Both methods involve checking or modifying the contents of a collection, though containsAll only checks for presence.
Both methods involve removing elements from the collection, with removeAll being a bulk operation of remove.
Both methods handle input streams, though readObject is for deserialization and removeAll is for collection modification.
Both methods handle output streams, though writeObject is for serialization and removeAll is for collection modification.
